articles.title: Zach LaVine met only with Chicago Bulls in free agency, says to do otherwise would've been 'disrespectful'
articles.description: Zach LaVine, speaking Monday for the first time since signing a max contract extension with Chicago, said he didn't meet with any other teams during the free-agency period, believing that to do so would have been "disrespectful."

articles.title: Gareth Bale aims for a long MLS stay during LAFC unveiling
articles.description: Gareth Bale was unveiled by Los Angeles FC on Monday and set his sights on a long-term stay in the MLS.
articles.content:
If everything goes according to plan, Gareth Bale insists his stay in Los Angeles won't be a short one.

articles.title: Orlando Magic shut Paolo Banchero down for remainder of 2022 NBA summer league
articles.description: After a sterling first couple of games, the Magic decided to shut down No. 1 pick Paolo Banchero for the remainder of summer league.
articles.content:
